subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lamb of national champion Connecticut scored 35 points, including a baseline jumper with 1.5 seconds left in overtime, to lead the United States to a 107-105 victory over Lithuania in the second round of FIBA’s Under 19 World Championship.
snippet: Jeremy Lamb of national champion Connecticut scored 35 points, including a baseline jumper with 1.5 seconds left in overtime, to lead the United States to a 107-105 victory over Lithuania in the second round of FIBA’s Under 19 World Championship.
